Barry, (and Richard)

Impressive save on knowledge!
Looks I get a new book today.

Richard, I love those photos. I can see much in
Darcy's photograph of things like the Kanemitsu, but
sometimes I would kill for an phenomenal full view
photo like your Kaneyoshi tanto.
   Absolutely lovely Yamato tanto.

Curran




--- Barry Thomas <warlord@...> wrote:
> Richard George wrote:
> 
> > A good dissertation on lighting stuff is in a book
> called
> > "color, light, and magic" (can't remember the
> author
> > at the moment).
> 
> Richard I preserved your hard work of a couple years
> ago and I believe the book
> you are referring to is:
> 
> > And FWIW, for those of you who really want to
> figure
> > out the lighting, order a copy of Light Science &
> Magic by
> > Hunter and Fuqua - I learned more about how to
> light stuff
> > in the first couple of chapters than from the half
> dozen other
> > books on photography/lighting I've read (and I've
> got the rest
> > of the book to go :-) )
> 
> Best regards,
> 
> Barry Thomas
> (Melbourne, Australia)
>
